params.name: block_size
params.description: The maximum sequence length that this model might ever be used with. Typically set this to something largejust in case (e.g., 512 or 1024 or 2048).

params.name: input_vocab_size
params.description: Vocabulary size of a Bark sub-model. Defines the number of different tokens that can be represented by theinputs_ids passed when calling BarkSemanticModel. Defaults to 10_048 but should be carefully thought withregards to the chosen sub-model.

params.name: output_vocab_size
params.description: Output vocabulary size of a Bark sub-model. Defines the number of different tokens that can be representedby the: output_ids when passing forward a BarkSemanticModel. Defaults to 10_048 but should be carefully thoughtwith regards to the chosen sub-model.

params.name: num_layers
params.description: Number of hidden layers in the given sub-model.

params.name: num_heads
params.description: Number of attention heads for each attention layer in the Transformer architecture.

params.name: hidden_size
params.description: Dimensionality of the intermediate (often named feed-forward) layer in the architecture.

params.name: dropout
params.description: The dropout probability for all fully connected layers in the embeddings, encoder, and pooler.

params.name: bias
params.description: Whether or not to use bias in the linear layers and layer norm layers.

params.name: initializer_range
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.

params.name: use_cache
params.description: Whether or not the model should return the last key/values attentions (not used by all models).
